title: Screen Flicker
body: I have been having this issue for a few days now. Every time I go to load into a game it gets to the load screen and just sits there and flickers. My GPU drivers are up to date. I have defragged my system and am still having this issue. Can anyone please help?

replies.body:
This could be caused by a background program or windows power settings. I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a next step.

Let me know if you have any questions.
